synopsis.text: Laboratory heroes unite in this thrilling anime OVA, based on the Narumi Seo character map story event from the smartphone game released in April 2018. Prepare to meet Seo, an extraordinary individual with a unique memory disorder, and other brave members of the Seo Research Laboratory who were not featured in the previous television anime. Joining the team is Rei Izumi, a fresh face at the Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare's narcotics investigation unit. As a scout for the recently established STAND, Izumi's mission is to gather the most exceptional agents, investigators, and informants to form a specialized team. Their first challenge: to identify and neutralize the dangerous drug wreaking havoc on the lives of unsuspecting Tokyo citizens.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
